definition: (of a mountain) high and tapered peak or summit/mountain-like in appearance/highest level/classifier for camels
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
East Asia Summit, annual meeting of leading Asian states

sentences.english: This protest will not affect the summit and its outcome.
sentences.chinese: 此次抗议活动将不会左右峰会本身及其结果。

sentences.english: The summit of Western Banquet activities will be the biggest bright spot.
sentences.chinese: 本次峰会的西餐夜宴将是活动的最大亮点。

sentences.english: Energy security is the theme of this year's G-8 summit in St.
sentences.chinese: 能源安全是今年圣彼得堡八国峰会的主题。

sentences.english: The portents are bad for next month's climate change summit in Copenhagen.
sentences.chinese: 这对于下月在哥本哈根召开的气候变化峰会是种恶兆。

sentences.english: eg: I sincerely wish this Business Summit a complete success.
sentences.chinese: 我衷心祝愿本届峰会取得圆满成功。

sentences.english: What is the proposed theme of WMS?
sentences.chinese: 世界媒体峰会的主题是什么？

sentences.english: Fittingly, there should be a deep focus on trade and investment.
sentences.chinese: 理所当然，峰会应当重点关注贸易和投资。
多达60%的人拒绝执行峰会合约。

sentences.chinese: 里约集团峰会将成立拉美及加勒比国家共同体。

sentences.english: Mr. Obama is the first U.S. president to chair a summit-level meeting at the council.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马是主持安理会峰会级会议的首位美国总统。

sentences.english: The unified voice at this summit is a good start.
sentences.chinese: 这次峰会上的一致声音是个好的开始。

sentences.english: If you’re attending OMS later this month, please say hello.
sentences.chinese: 如果你这个月底参加网络营销峰会，请打个招呼。

sentences.chinese: 在日前举行的中国IT领袖峰会，李彦宏这样说道。

sentences.english: The NATO Summit will be held simultaneously with a Group of Eight Summit.
sentences.chinese: 北约峰会将与8国集团峰会同时举行。

sentences.chinese: 北约峰会将与8国集团峰会同时举行。

sentences.english: At the final press conference Friday, Mr. Van Rumpoy hailed the results.
sentences.chinese: 范龙佩在星期五的记者会上对峰会的结果表示满意。
